string.text: Rew, I've got him pinned down!
I'm crushing him, come on, Bull!
I'll cover you! He won't stick his nose out!
Give him a light, I'll go!
Did you see how I did?
Whoa! That's it! I've had it!
All right, you got the bastard!
Points for three, you're shooting at your own!
Watch what you're shooting at, you fool!
You arsehole, what are you doing?
Watch where you're throwing it! You idiotic piece of shit!
You almost got me, you arsehole!
You've got eyes, you prick! I'm my own man!
Hands out of the arse! STUDY!
Here's a little something for you!
Thank you, everyone, you're all dismissed!
You can take a break, little one.
Quiet! We'll wait a little longer!
Well, let's wait a little longer for a guarantee!
We're looking for him fast! Quickly, before he gets away!
Where'd you get it, you bastard?
Hey, you! Don't think! You haven't left us yet!
He's a dog! Let's find him!
It's okay, you won't get away! We'll find you!
Come out and don't hide! Die like a man!
You can't get away from me!
You're a freak! You're a dead man! Do you get it?!
You bastard, I'm gonna get you!
Hey! We got a man down here!
Man, just hold on a little longer, we're coming!
Man, just hold on a little longer, we're coming!
Don't worry, bro, we'll be right there!
Don't worry, bro, we'll be right there!
Man, relax, we'll all be there.
You don't want to be a rat? Do you need a hand?
Look at that! It's still twitching!
You should be thankful I don't spare bullets.
Don't worry, bro, I'm a good doctor.
Don't worry, I've got a first aid kit, I can fix you in one go.
I'll get you back on your feet, no problem.
That's how you're going to die, not by the tail of a dog!
Someone's sticking their nose in where it doesn't belong! We'll get him now!
You guys, you're on! Oh, you're a jerk!
Guys, there's a jerk in our drawer!
That's like honey on a stick
Hey, you're doing a great job!
Music and anthos you're still the same.
And no one on the horizon. That's good, that's good.

They're packs, but they're animals by the colour of their skins. Some of them have been outlawing and still are. Others are either guarding us from the zone or the zone is guarding us from the zone. With a fucking soldier, too. Slapping a man with it is like blowing your nose.
I wish I had something good to eat, but I don't.
Yeah, the mood couldn't be worse.
Ehhhhh, it's not that kind of hubbub anymore, it's not that kind of hubbub, it's time to call it quits.
Yeah, that's how sad it is, isn't it?
No, there's no escaping fate. What's written in your blood, it's what will happen.
Newcomers are like dogs nowadays, and they know everything better than the old guys.

Don't learn anything, some don't want to learn. You've seen too many American films or you're greedy. You tell him about the anomalies, he tells you about the loot. They don't want to think about anything but women while their guts are in a twist will scatter.
Oh, I wish I could always be so lucky. Is that an estimate? Yeah, that's right. Three or four hikes like yesterday. If only the gab was as good, and I'm done with the fucking zone.
Oh, I don't feel like going for the loot today. Now I'd like to be at home, in a pussy, with a good book.
Centre of the zone, centre of the zone for me too. There's not a lot of artifact in the code.

And here I thought it was just a matter of getting past the burner. Somewhere in here is a treasure trove of artefacts and a wish granter. Fool! Here, you fool. Well, you know, your luck is idiotic. What about artefacts? Nothing but untravelled trails and unfed critters.
Not bad, not bad. In one go, two night stars. If this keeps up, I don't give a damn about your boasted klandyke.
Holy shit, I saw Pripyat yesterday with my own eyes, if someone had told me a month ago, I never would have believed it.
I'm gonna save up for my house after all, That the burechki and the woods are close by, No radiation, no creatures, no bastards.
I'm so thirsty. I'd like some cold kvass, and I'd like it to blow my nose.
a piece of meat so big it would curl up and be juicy
And sausage and baton bases are shitty old things to make nowadays.
Nothing, it's okay, we'll get through, it's not for nothing that I've been smoking the sky here for so long, me and my mates, we'll get through.
They've got no conscience at all, they've had a week's worth of sole damage.
Oh, shit, huh? The day's gone to hell. Niihabara no weld.
And this one's as naked as a falcon
You're not even going into the zone with that kind of stuff.
No good will go to waste, I reckon.
All right, man, what you got?
I'm sorry, but it's no use to you anymore.
You were a handy man, man!
Don't mess around, hide your gun!
I'm not gonna talk to you.
I don't want to talk to you!
I'm not really in the mood to talk these days.
What's there to talk about now?
Man, you're crazy, we'll talk later!
There's gunfire, you moron! Later, all later!
If you need anything, ask the man in charge.
Look, all questions for the man in charge!
There's an older man standing over there, so you talk to him.
Clean up your guns first, or what are we gonna talk about?
I don't like talking under the radar, man.
Nah, that's no way to have a conversation. Hide the gun, hide the gun!
Erm... All right Yeah, I really am A good one I swear whatever you want
So they hung their ears. A hundred, yeah, yeah.
I could use a little extra cash. Money burns your pocket.
Come on, show me the goods today. Let me see what I've got enough for.
Show me what you got. I've got a little bit of coin.
Listen, I've got a good one, I've got a good one. I wish I had one of these once a week.
I've been a bit rubbish around here. Look.
I've been scrabbling around here, I've had no luck lately.
Attention, I'm giving away a humour joke!

Says a new Russian to an acquaintance Stalker. I want you to bring me a goldfish in a cloud of monkfish you'll tell me, cos all the boys have one, and I'm the only one I'm kind of a sucker. Well, Stalker is freaking out. Well, that's what the radioactive artefact says. New Russian. I'm not putting it in my pants I will. I'm supposed to be on the chain, and I've been pulling everything else like in humans.

A long vec got lost one day, he walks and shouts. "People, get back to me! Somebody! Awwwwwww..." Somebody catches up with him and slaps him on the rucksack. So he turns round, and there's a bloodsucker standing there. "Sad like that! Ichlou by that, then... What are you yelling about, eh!" Udolos already has a wall full of dejacks, but he's still responds. "Did I therefore... confused? Krichel? Here, maybe someone will hear?" The bloodsucker is quiet and silent and tells him. "Well I've heard it! What are we going to do now?"

Two people crossed paths. You, Vasya, remember? You know, the one who told everyone how he got in three times. I remember. Why? So he got into a ski-jump the other day. Wow! That's it! A man's dream come true, he flew.

Two stalkers are sitting on the shore of a lake. One says to the other. About the radiation, I'll tell you what? They're driving like I don't know what. Been going for about five years now, I've been on the road for five years, I haven't changed a thing I didn't notice any. What do you think? It's bullshit. Although on the other hand, the chushuyatovs lately are itching more and more.
One stalker to another says the other day I went to the debtor's house for a light, and as if I owed him money Then I went to freedom, and they told me the man was free

Anyway, Stalker goes to the doctor and says, "Doctor, I can't sleep at all. I dream I'm trapped in a sarcophagus with a bunch of monsters, and they're slowly ripping me to shreds. This is a warning to you, honourable controller." My recipe goes like this. Next time you go deep into the zone, be sure to give him a bottle. It's not like you're gonna turn a dream into a java. "Well, thank you very much, Doctor." "You're welcome, says the controller. That's for the doctor, thank you. It's a small thing, but it feels good."

Hanging on the base of a long advert. Organised a trip to the zone to hunt monsters and the search for artefacts. A gathering of all interested amateurs is scheduled for 9.00. It's a case of taking two bottles of each.

One day, a contract soldier got lost in the zone, walking and shouting "People, somebody help!" And there's a stalker sitting in the bushes, quietly chattering away Yeah, yeah, yeah, so it's three hides at the roadblock, so assholes and bastards And once you're up the arse, it's "People, help me!"

One day, a driver interrogates Ryuga, an old stolka. So, you admit to drunkenly attempting to leave the area around the 12th roadblock and were in possession of prohibited items. I'm sick of being held for three hours. Oh, he says to him. That's how I recognise her, commander! I admit it! Here's a cross for you! If I was sober, I'd walk past you freaks with the loot I wouldn't go.

A seasoned stalker is standing at the third crossroads and the index reads. To the right, anomalies and some loot. Go ahead, monsters galore and medium-sized loot. Left, pubs, girls and loads of loot. So he thought, he thought, and he moved on. He thinks I've heard of it, but I forgot about it. I'll have to check with my mates at the bar to see what's going on Such pubs and girls.
I don't want to talk to you!
I'm not in the mood to talk these days.
Look, I'm tired, I can't talk!
Man, you're crazy, we'll talk later!
This is no time to talk!
There's gunfire, you moron! We'll talk afterwards!
Talking now? What's wrong with you?
Hey, what do you want in the middle of the night?
There, there, on the shelf look.
Oh, fuck you! Where do you want it?
Put the gun away first, then we can talk.
Come on, man, if we're gonna talk, let's do it the easy way. No guns!
No, we're not gonna have this conversation. Put the gun away!
Get the fuck out of here, all right?
What are you standing there for? Get out of here while you're still in one piece, man!
I wish you'd get out of here right now, huh?
Don't mess around, hide your gun!
No kidding, put the gun away!
